name: Starve
description:
The Basic concept of the game is to collect food and stay away from monsters you encounter during your adventure.

If you walk to a wall you can destroy is by hitting the key that faces the wall.

The berry's give you 10 food.

The cans give you 20 food.

Keep the screen resolution to 640x480 windowed for the best results.

Controls :

Move : W,A,S,D
